Package com.carrentalsystem.dao

Class ICarLeaseRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.carrentalsystem.dao.ICarLeaseRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICarLeaseRepository
public class ICarLeaseRepositoryImpl extends Object implements ICarLeaseRepository
This class implements the ICarLeaseRepository interface to provide methods for managing car rental operations in the database.
